field.name: summary
field.value: Add Name and Resources properties to ITransaction

field.name: description
field.value:
http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=963
Add Name property on ITransaction so transactions in place of GetHashCode (transactions created without a name use GetHashCode()).
Add Resources property to ITransaction that contains a list of IResources that were added with Enlist.
Added CommitResourceException and RollbackResourceException that contain the most recently failed IResource as well as all the failed IResources.
Added test cases.
